vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.19;
son of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Mahalath (H4258H);
brother of: Jeush (H3266K) and Shemariah (H8114H);
half-brother of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I), Ziza (H2124H) and Shelomith (H8019G)
§ Zaham = "loathing"
the son of Rehoboam by Mahalath, David's granddaughter
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Roboam, rey de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒罕 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "憎恨"
羅波安和大衛王的孫女瑪哈拉所生的兒子 (代下11:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒罕 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "憎恨"
罗波安和大卫王的孙女玛哈拉所生的儿子 (代下11:19)
